meanings.definition: A group of hydrocarbons found in petroleum
meanings.sent1: Scientists study phytanes to learn more about petroleum composition.
meanings.sent2: The lab analyzed the phytanes present in the crude oil sample.
meanings.sent3: The phytanes in the oil were having a party, celebrating their unique properties.
meanings.sent4: The phytanes acted like the backbone of the petroleum structure, holding it together.
meanings.sent5: The distinct smell of phytanes lingered in the air, reminding us of the oil's origin.

meanings.sent1: The researchers collected various phytanes for their experiment.
meanings.sent2: In the storage room, you could see rows of phytanes neatly arranged.
meanings.sent3: The phytanes decided to form a club, calling themselves 'The Plural Phytane Party'.
meanings.sent4: The phytanes stood together like a united army, ready to face any chemical reaction.
meanings.sent5: Each of the phytanes had a unique shape, contributing to the diversity of the group.
